EmailTemplate.subject: Missing Oshkosh? Let’s share the spirit of aviation!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]>
Hello EAA pilots and friends!
While we can't be in Oshkosh, we can still share the spirit of aviation. In today’s environment, we understand that you are looking to save money and get the most out of your avionics and we’re here to keep you informed and flying.
***VIRTUAL EAA***
- Meet us at the "virtual" BendixKing pavilion HERE <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/about-us/events/2020/07/eaa-airventure-2020]]> - Stay informed. Find recent STCs, demos on AeroCruze autopilot, AeroVue Touch and more - Watch on-demand webinars, customer stories and take advantage of show promotions
***WORLD RECORD***
- Who is Travis Ludlow? An amazing 17-year-old on a quest to be the youngest pilot to fly solo around the world - See his planned flight routes, maps, and podcasts, including an interview with EAA Young Eagles - Share this link <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/about-us/events/2020/07/eaa-airventure-2020]]>. Let’s inspire all those young aviators out there and cheer Travis on together
Stay well. We’ll see you soon—until then, we wish you clear skies ahead.
Andrew Barker Vice President Experimental and Aftermarket BendixKing
